dict.acceptation: 光滑的；流畅的；柔软的；温和的，安详的；
使平滑；排除，消除；安抚，平息；使优雅；

sent.orig: Have 1-3 technology based on contour machining after considering the smooth lines smooth, concise.
sent.trans: 有了1-3技术加工基础后在外形考虑线条的流畅光滑简洁。

sent.orig: This enamel porcelain features bumpy middle, smooth loach-back-like support, and shoulders with smooth and natural line.
sent.trans: 此款珐琅彩瓷器造型特点：腹部丰满，底足为光滑的泥鳅背，器物肩部线条流畅自然。

sent.orig: This roller makes good painting and smooth finish, recommend to word with smooth surface.
sent.trans: 本白涤纶滚筒刷，涂刷效果平滑、吸油量大，推荐使用于各种光滑表面。

sent.orig: Due to its unusual smooth paste state after it dissolves, it makes drink taste good smooth.
sent.trans: 在水中溶解后独特的细腻糖浆状，使得饮品口感特好．更爽口。

sent.orig: A bit of spot putty to smooth things over and then I sanded It'smooth.
sent.trans: 有点现货的腻子，以打圆场，然后我用砂纸它顺利。
